posts.post_content:
I am looking to put together a very low grade set.  Considerable back damage, even to the point of skins is ok. As my focus is on the front, back variations are not a consideration.  Would like good price.  Do not want slabbed, but if they are cheap enough I will bust them out....Even small pieces of card are ok...they will be appreciated...please pm or email

I have nothing that low grade but a gentleman was offering a huge lot of skinned T205s several weeks ago for a very low per card price.  Take a look through the BST over the past month bc it seems right up your alley.

And good luck!
-SGL

[quote name="scottglevy" post=834817]I have nothing that low grade but a gentleman was offering a huge lot of skinned T205s several weeks ago for a very low per card price.  Take a look through the BST over the past month bc it seems right up your alley.

And good luck!
-SGL[/QUOTE]

I got most of my start from a group of several hundred skins. I have been working with them and have found them to be interesting and likable, if quite rough.

Let me know the address to ship a Carrigan for the priviledge of being here on the board with a great group of people.

Rawn

A rough lot at a fair price so far.
[url]http://cgi.ebay.com/1911-t-205-t-206-Piedmont-Sweet-Caporal-Lot-8-Poor-/140452001494?pt=US_Baseball&hash=item20b39776d6[/url]

Luke
